passive.name: VOID STONE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) VOID STONE
                                Gains a shield that absorbs 50 magic damage (50 + 30% ) for 1.5s when casting a spell near a visible enemy champion. (9s cooldown)

q.name: (Q) NULL SPHERE
q.description:
(Q) NULL SPHERE
 10/9/8/7s   70/75/80/85 
                                
                                
                                Fires an orb that deals 80 magic damage (80/145/210/275 + 80%  )and silences the first enemy hit for 1s.

w.name: (W) NETHER BLADE
w.description:
(W) NETHER BLADE
 10s   20 
                                
                                
                                Enhances his next attack within 4s to gain 250 range, deal an additional 50 magic damage (50/80/110/140 + 50% ) and restore 5% of missing mana (15% vs. champions).If the attack killed the target Nether Blade's remaning cooldown is reduced by 50%.

e.name: (E) FORCE PULSE
e.description:
(E) FORCE PULSE
 12/10/8/6s   70/75/80/85 
                                
                                
                                Deals 60 magic damage (60/100/140/180 + 50% ) to enemies and slows them by 30% for 1s.Force Pulse is enhanced after 6 spells are cast nearby, dealing 40% increased damage and slowing for 90% instead.

r.name: (R) RIFTWALK
r.description:
(R) RIFTWALK
 5/3.5/2s  
                                
                                
                                Blinks to target location and deals 80 magic damage (80/100/120 + 30%  + 1.5%  ) to nearby enemies.The next Riftwalk cast within 12s deals 50% increased damage an costs 200% mana (Stacks 3 times).
